segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the open window first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks inviting with its bushes and path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman is drying a plate with concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out, soaking her shoes without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are behind her, up to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the tilting stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause a huge accident!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules, taking cookies like thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be a slippery mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel anxious watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to the dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR
